div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ChargeItem|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `ChargeItem` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `ChargeItem`. Element `ChargeItem` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem`.
Element `ChargeItem.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.meta`.
Element `ChargeItem.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.implicitRules`.
Element `ChargeItem.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.language`.
Element `ChargeItem.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.text`.
Element `ChargeItem.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.contained`.
Element `ChargeItem.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.identifier`.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionUri` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.definitionUri`.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical`.
Element `ChargeItem.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.status`.
Element `ChargeItem.partOf` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.partOf`.
Element `ChargeItem.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.code`.
Element `ChargeItem.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.subject`.
Element `ChargeItem.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.context`.

Note that the target element context `ChargeItem.occurrence[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ChargeItem`. Element `ChargeItem.occurrence[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.occurrence[x]`. Note that the target element context `ChargeItem.occurrence[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ChargeItem`.
Element `ChargeItem.performer` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.performer`.
Element `ChargeItem.performer.function` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.performer.function`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `ChargeItem.performer.actor` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `ChargeItem.performer.actor` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.performer.actor`.
Element `ChargeItem.performingOrganization` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.performingOrganization`.
Element `ChargeItem.requestingOrganization` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.requestingOrganization`.
Element `ChargeItem.costCenter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.costCenter`.
Element `ChargeItem.quantity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.quantity`.
Element `ChargeItem.bodysite` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.bodysite`.
Element `ChargeItem.unitPriceComponent` is will have a context of ChargeItem based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItem`.
Element `ChargeItem.totalPriceComponent` is will have a context of ChargeItem based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItem`.
Element `ChargeItem.overrideReason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.overrideReason`.
Element `ChargeItem.enterer` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.enterer`.
Element `ChargeItem.enteredDate` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.enteredDate`.
Element `ChargeItem.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.reason`.
Element `ChargeItem.service` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.service`.

Note that the target element context `ChargeItem.product[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ChargeItem`. Element `ChargeItem.product` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.product[x]`. Note that the target element context `ChargeItem.product[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ChargeItem`.
Element `ChargeItem.account` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.account`.
Element `ChargeItem.note` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.note`.
Element `ChargeItem.supportingInformation` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItem.supportingInformation`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
